actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To provide for the continuation of epidemiological activities being conducted in the State of Texas with respect to the elevated rate in certain areas of the State of a lethal birth defect, and for other purposes.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Centers for Disease Control for epidemiological activities in Texas regarding the elevated rate of anencephaly (a birth defect) and for educating health care providers and the public regarding anencephaly.

titles.title: To provide for the continuation of epidemiological activities being conducted in the State of Texas with respect to the elevated rate in certain areas of the State of a lethal birth defect, and for other purposes.
